attributes.action: Increase the notice required for property viewings from 24 hours to a longer period for tenants benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently a tenant renting a property has the right to have 24 hours notice given to them by the letting agents if they want to do a viewing. I think this is far too short and know from experience just how annoying it can be when lettings agents want to do numerous viewings per week. Definitely a longer notice period would benefit everyone.
